mapper.select: select consulting_no, to_char(report_ymd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as report_ymd, customer_type, id, name, birth, main_category, middle_category,title, consulting_report, consulting_channel, admin_name, empno, progress, add_consulting from report_tb order by consulting_no desc

select consulting_no, to_char(report_ymd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as report_ymd, customer_type, id, name, birth, main_category, middle_category,title, consulting_report, consulting_channel, admin_name, empno, progress, add_consulting from report_tb where id = #{id} order by consulting_no desc
